title: Trust In Media PLUMMETS - THIS Is Why
description:
Trust in the legacy media is at a record low. Coincidentally, the rise of independent media is being threatened by new laws across the world and by a cartel of big tech and legacy media institutions working together to choke off competition. How did we get here, and what can we do about it?
